name: Gachapon & Goblins
description:
Fill your arsenal from the dice gachapon machine and take on your goblin foes! Use tactical risk assessment to choose which dice from your pool to commit to the battle, you'll only win if their total exceeds the health of your opponent! Will you have enough dice left over for your next encounter?

After defeating all enemies, the game will return you to the start!

Controls

This game is controlled entirely using your mouse!

Credits

Peter Cuffley - Programming

Jake Green - Programming

Josh Leland- Programming & Art

Rebecca Donaldson - Art

Audio by Yubatake from OpenGameArt.org

SFX by Kenny
